summary: I know it's the new year and everyone is most likely sick of Christmas but I just finished up this set of Dan (@danielhowell)...
body:
I know it’s the new year and everyone is most likely sick of Christmas but I just finished up this set of Dan (@danielhowell) and Phil (@amazingphil) in festive sweaters and had way too much fun taking pictures with them haha. My Christmas this year was pretty much all D&P merch so this is very relevant to me XD

Also I got the interactive introverts DVD’s (I got both covers don’t judge me, I wanted to supprt them as much as I could 😅) and it made my Christmas! My holiday depression was quickly overridden by the joy of it!

reblog.comment:
